sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM applied_promo_code
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ OR ip = :P2 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */

SELECT id, promo_name, promo_code, amt_or_percent, promo_amt, promo_per
FROM promo_code
WHERE promo_code = :P1 /* {{$_GET.promo_code}} */ AND start_date < :P2 /* {{NOW}} */ AND end_date >= :P3 /* {{NOW}} */ AND status = 1 AND (allotted_for = :P4 /* {{'All'}} */ OR user_id = :P5 /* {{identity}} */)

INSERT INTO applied_promo_code
(promo_id, promo_code, user_id, applied_date, status, created_on, created_by, ip) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetPromoCode.id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetPromoCode.promo_code}} */, :P3 /* {{identity}} */, :P4 /* {{NOW}} */, :P5 /* {{1}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{identity}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */)

UPDATE applied_promo_code
SET promo_id = :P1 /* {{GetPromoCode.id}} */, promo_code = :P2 /* {{GetPromoCode.promo_code}} */, user_id = :P3 /* {{identity}} */, applied_date = :P4 /* {{NOW}} */, status = :P5 /* {{1}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, updated_by = :P7 /* {{identity}} */, ip = :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */
WHERE user_id = :P9 /* {{identity}} */ OR ip = :P10 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM applied_promo_code
WHERE ip = :P1 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */

SELECT id, promo_name, promo_code, amt_or_percent, promo_amt, promo_per
FROM promo_code
WHERE promo_code = :P1 /* {{$_GET.promo_code}} */ AND start_date < :P2 /* {{NOW}} */ AND end_date >= :P3 /* {{NOW}} */ AND status = 1 AND allotted_for = :P4 /* {{'All'}} */

INSERT INTO applied_promo_code
(promo_id, promo_code, applied_date, status, created_on, ip) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetPromoCode.id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetPromoCode.promo_code}} */, :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, :P4 /* {{1}} */, :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, :P6 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */)

UPDATE applied_promo_code
SET promo_id = :P1 /* {{GetPromoCode.id}} */, promo_code = :P2 /* {{GetPromoCode.promo_code}} */, applied_date = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, status = :P4 /* {{1}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, ip = :P6 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */
WHERE ip = :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */
